title: Best of the Program | 1/14/20
description:
While the Left is notorious for its double standards, nothing says it better than Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s lessons on wearing blackface – just be liberal and it’s fine! President Trump got a warm welcome at the LSU vs. Clemson football game, although Vince Vaughn might now be canceled because of it. Elsewhere in the 2020 race, Bloomberg will spend millions to control your life and Elizabeth Warren confirmed that Bernie Sanders told her a woman couldn’t win the presidency. But while Bernie denies it, an old article he wrote about weird fantasies sure seems sexist. And John Kerry, Obama’s secretary of state, admitted not only that giving money to Iran would fund terrorism, but that he was okay with it!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
